SELECT C.cart_no , @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum , C.goods_no , NVL(C.option_no,0) AS option_no , C.goods_count AS goods_cnt , G.goods_name AS goods_name , NVL(O.option_name,"") AS option_name , G.price AS goods_price , NVL(O.price_updown,0) AS option_price , ((NVL(G.price,0) + NVL(O.price_updown,0)) * NVL(C.goods_count,0)) AS goods_final_price , G.image AS goods_thumnail FROM tb_cart AS C JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM:=-1) AS R LEFT JOIN tb_goods AS G ON G.goods_no = C.goods_no LEFT JOIN tb_goods_option AS O ON O.option_no = C.option_no WHERE C.member_no = #{member_no} AND C.cart_no IN
#{cart_no}

SELECT 0 AS cart_no , @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum , G.goods_no , NVL(O.option_no,0) AS option_no , #{goods_cnt} AS goods_cnt , G.goods_name AS goods_name , NVL(O.option_name,"") AS option_name , G.price AS goods_price , NVL(O.price_updown,0) AS option_price , ((NVL(G.price,0) + NVL(O.price_updown,0)) * NVL(#{goods_cnt},0)) AS goods_final_price , G.image AS goods_thumnail FROM tb_goods AS G LEFT JOIN tb_goods_option AS O ON O.option_no = #{option_no} WHERE G.goods_no = #{goods_no}

SELECT AD.place_no AS place_no , @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum , AD.place_name AS place_name , AD.receive_name AS recevier_name , AD.receive_hp AS phone , AD.receive_addr AS addr1 , AD.receive_addr2 AS addr2 , AD.receive_zipcode AS zipcode , NVL(AD.postman_notice,"안전하게 와주세요!") AS notice FROM tb_address AS AD JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM:=-1) AS R LEFT JOIN tb_member AS M ON M.member_no = AD.member_no WHERE AD.member_no = #{member_no}
SELECT NVL(member_mileage, 0) AS mileage FROM tb_member WHERE member_no = #{member_no}
